original: There are no enemies. Press ENTER to leave combat!
translate: There are no enemies. Press ENTER to leave combat!

original: The combatants stare at each other from across the battlefield
translate: The combatants stare at each other from across the battlefield

original: REMEMBER: You can press RETURN on your turn to auto-resolve combat!
translate: REMEMBER: You can press RETURN on your turn to auto-resolve combat!

original: Hold action until end of turn
translate: Hold action until end of turn

original: fights defensivly and gains +3 to Dodge until next turn!
translate: fights defensively and gains +3 to Dodge until next turn!
